statements.statement: SELECT /*+ 위상규::/gcb/batch/itOpSpt/itrLgnLdg/itrLgnDplxBasTrstJob/ItrLgnDplxBasTrst/retvItrLgnDplxBasNcn */ COUNT(1) 건수_N15 FROM INSTC.TBGCBIB01 A /* GCB인터넷로그인이중화기본 */

SELECT /*+ 위상규::/gcb/batch/itOpSpt/itrLgnLdg/itrLgnDplxBasTrstJob/ItrLgnDplxBasTrst/retvLstItrLgnDplxBasSvcUseDtcdGrp */ A.서비스사용구분코드 , COUNT(*) 건수_N15 FROM INSTC.TBGCBIB01 A /* GCB인터넷로그인이중화기본 */ GROUP BY A.서비스사용구분코드

SELECT /*+ 위상규::/gcb/batch/itOpSpt/itrLgnLdg/itrLgnDplxBasTrstJob/ItrLgnDplxBasTrst/retvItrLgnDplxBasItrSvrSndYmd */ MIN(A.인터넷서버송신년월일) 인터넷서버송신년월일1 , MAX(A.인터넷서버송신년월일) 인터넷서버송신년월일2 FROM (SELECT B.인터넷서버송신년월일 || ' COUNT=' || COUNT(*) 인터넷서버송신년월일 FROM INSTC.TBGCBIB01 B /* GCB인터넷로그인이중화기본 */ GROUP BY B.인터넷서버송신년월일) A

SELECT /*+ 위상규::/gcb/batch/itOpSpt/itrLgnLdg/itrLgnDplxBasTrstJob/ItrLgnDplxBasTrst/retvLstItrLgnDplxBasGrp */ A.고객분류구분코드 , A.서비스유형구분코드 , A.뱅킹구분코드 , COUNT(*) 건수_N15 FROM INSTC.TBGCBIB01 A /* GCB인터넷로그인이중화기본 */ GROUP BY A.고객분류구분코드 , A.서비스유형구분코드 , A.뱅킹구분코드
